engine.physics

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.physics.AABB

  • public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
    A 2D axis-aligned bounding box.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AABB(float minX, float minY, float maxX, float maxY)
      Creates a new AABB based on it's extents.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getCenterX()
      Calculates the center of this AABB on the X axis.
      float getCenterY()
      Calculates the center of this AABB on the Y axis.

      Calculates the distance between this AABB and another on the X axis.
      float getDistanceY(AABB other)
      Calculates the distance between this AABB and another on the Y axis.

      Gets the maximum extent of this AABB on the X axis.
      float getMaxY()
      Gets the maximum extent of this AABB on the Y axis.
      float getMinX()
      Gets the minimum extent of this AABB on the X axis.
      float getMinY()
      Gets the minimum extent of this AABB on the Y axis.
      boolean intersectAABB(AABB other)
      Determines if this AABB intersects another one.
      boolean intersectRect(float minX, float minY, float maxX, float maxY)
      Determines if this AABB intersects a 2D rectangle with known extents.

      • AABB

        public AABB(float minX,
    float minY,
    float maxX,
    float maxY)
        Creates a new AABB based on it's extents.
        Parameters:
        minX - The minimum extent of the box on X.
        minY - The minimum extent of the box on Y.
        maxX - The maximum extent of the box on X.
        maxY - The maximum extent of the box on Y.

      • intersectAABB

        public boolean intersectAABB(AABB other)
        Determines if this AABB intersects another one.
        Parameters:
        other - The AABB to test against.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this AABB intersects other.

      • intersectRect

        public boolean intersectRect(float minX,
                    float minY,
                    float maxX,
                    float maxY)
        Determines if this AABB intersects a 2D rectangle with known extents.
        Parameters:
        minX - The minimum extent of the rectangle on X.
        minY - The minimum extent of the rectangle on Y.
        maxX - The maximum extent of the rectangle on X.
        maxY - The maximum extent of the rectangle on Y.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this AABB intersects the rectangle.
